short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Download images from Instagram in a quality of your choice (supports high-quality image downloading)
short.de: Bilder von Instagram in einer Qualität Ihrer Wahl herunterladen (unterstützt das Herunterladen von Bildern in hoher Qualität)
short.es: Descargue imágenes de Instagram en la calidad que desee (admite la descarga de imágenes de alta calidad)
short.fr: Téléchargez des images d'Instagram dans la qualité de votre choix (permet le téléchargement d'images de haute qualité)
short.it: Scaricate le immagini da Instagram in una qualità a vostra scelta (supporta il download di immagini di alta qualità)
short.ja: インスタグラムの画像をお好みのクオリティでダウンロード（高画質画像ダウンロードに対応
short.nl: Download afbeeldingen van Instagram in een kwaliteit naar keuze (ondersteunt het downloaden van afbeeldingen van hoge kwaliteit)
short.pl: Pobieraj obrazy z Instagram w wybranej przez siebie jakości (obsługuje pobieranie obrazów wysokiej jakości)
short.pt_BR: Baixe imagens da Instagram em uma qualidade à sua escolha (suporta o download de imagens de alta qualidade)
short.pt_PT: Descarregar imagens da Instagram numa qualidade à sua escolha (suporta o descarregamento de imagens de alta qualidade)
short.ru: Загружайте изображения из Instagram в выбранном вами качестве (поддерживается высокое качество загрузки изображений).
short.zh_CN: 从Instagram下载图片，质量自选（支持高质量图片下载）。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
With this tool, you can download high-quality images from Instagram pages. To use the extension, open a new page on Instagram or reload an existing page. The extension adds a new label to each image on the top left side of the images. Each label indicates the current image quality. By pressing each label, you will get the image on the default browser download's directory.

Features:
Supports 150, 240, 320, 480, 640, 750, and 1080 pixel qualities.
Supports renaming each image to include page title.
Based on Manifest V3 (do not use any resource when the extension is not used).
Saves images in the well-known JPEG/JPG format.

Developer Notes:
Unlike general-purpose image downloaders (such as Download All Images), this extension tries to grab the image links from HTML5's image "srcset" attribute. This is the fastest method to find available image resources.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_C:
This tool adds download capability to your Instagram webpages. After installation, open an Instagram page or reload an existing page for the extension to add tags to all the loaded images. You can see all the available qualities on the top left side of each image. Click on the quality that you would like to download and wait for a few seconds. The image will be placed in your default browser download's directory.

This extension offers downloading images in 150, 240, 320, 480, 640, 750, and 1080 pixel qualities.

Note that this extension has none persistent background page, which means it is not using any resources when there is no open Instagram page.
